Topic.Title: Quest 5.8 - Error: Object reference not set to the instance of an object.

Posts.EditableText:
I was wondering if this error could be more useful --- such as if the object is in a library, where in the library. Where in the game file....what object is throwing the error, etc. I find this incredibly unhelpful especially with a big game. Any ideas?

Anonynn.
